snippet.textDisplay: Any child watching this who uh 'believes' in a existence of Santa & doesn't immidately question how they have been blindly lied to, I will accept, if parent(s) of said child simultaneously accepts, they have failed.
snippet.textOriginal: Any child watching this who uh 'believes' in a existence of Santa & doesn't immidately question how they have been blindly lied to, I will accept, if parent(s) of said child simultaneously accepts, they have failed.

snippet.textDisplay: *WHAT'S NOT OK IS HURTING THEIR FEELINGS. AND VIRGINIA O'HANLON, A REAL PERSON, WROTE A LETTER TO THE NEW YORK SUN ASKING THAT VERY QUESTION, AND WHAT WAS THEIR REPLY? "YES VIRGINIA, THERE IS A SANTA CLAUS."*
